long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Creating the relationship between locals and dealers. You too can become a local dealer at localDealr. localDealr is a free, fun, community driven platform to help you find, buy and sell locally and online, using your own personlized storefront where you are involved and have fun with a new and innovative approach. localDealr makes selling anything from anywhere as easy as pie. With localDealr you create, share and sell.

localDealr is:
• Free, Fun and Community Driven Tool.
• Find, Buy and Sell Locally.
• Your Own Personalized Storefront.
• Feel Involved and Have Fun :)
• New and Innovative Approach.
• What Everyone Has Been Waiting For!

Design matters
With localDealr you can create a awesome display case for your products and lets you present them in a clean, clear format formatted. 

localDealr Features:
 
• Powerful Analytics: See how many times your items has been viewed.

• Cross Platform Compatibility: Embed localDealr products anywhere on your website, Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, Blogger, WordPress, Posterous and many more!

• Built-in sharing: All your items have built-in sharing buttons for Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest and Email, so you can let your friends the the first to know about what you are selling, thus increasing the chances of you making a fast sale :)

• Great presentation features for what you are selling.
• Seller Reviews and Seller Rating System.
• Product Rating System.
• Know Where You are Buying From.
• Shipping or Pickup?
• Private Messaging System / Social Integration.
• Buyer Demands :)
• Increase the Chance of Results.
• New Unique Experience.

localDealr Future Updates Will Include:

• Bid System
• Seller Review / Rating
• Reward System
• Buyer Protection
• Personalized Experience / More Fun :D
• Your Personal localDealr Assistant :D
